THVanillaPatches.THPatchDef.label: Draw geyser previews
THVanillaPatches.THPatchDef.description: Highlight steam geysers while placing geothermal generators.

THVanillaPatches.THPatchDef.label: Polycule jealousy
THVanillaPatches.THPatchDef.description: Jealous pawns get a mood penalty if their lovers have another lover, even more so if they aren't the favorite.

THVanillaPatches.THPatchDef.label: Quiet carpets
THVanillaPatches.THPatchDef.description: Footsteps can't be heard on carpet or through drapes and walls. Great for barracks and cozy bedrooms.

THVanillaPatches.THPatchDef.label: Ageless immortals
THVanillaPatches.THPatchDef.description: Immortals (pawns with the non-senescent gene) no longer demand age reversal with the transhumanist meme.

THVanillaPatches.THPatchDef.label: Genderless apparel
THVanillaPatches.THPatchDef.description: Women in suits and men in corsets. Hell yeah. (pawns no longer get upset by wearing clothes of the "wrong gender")

THVanillaPatches.THPatchDef.label: Transfer prisoners
THVanillaPatches.THPatchDef.description: Can transfer prisoners to another bed.

THVanillaPatches.THPatchDef.label: Nocturnal caravans
THVanillaPatches.THPatchDef.description: Caravans primarily filled with pawns with the Night Owl trait or Darkness precept will travel at night and sleep during the day.

THVanillaPatches.THPatchDef.label: Apparel coverage
THVanillaPatches.THPatchDef.description: Pawns whose full body is covered with clothing no longer suffer sunlight sensitivity. Fully covered in spacer-tier clothing also prevents the soaking wet moodlet.

THVanillaPatches.THPatchDef.label: Misanthropists
THVanillaPatches.THPatchDef.description: Pawns with both the misogynist and misandrist trait have them replaced with misanthropist. Note that the misanthropist trait will still exist and function when this is disabled, it will just never appear naturally.
